short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share your screen while walking through or reviewing transaction forms and documents with transaciton parties.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Built for Chrome – zipForm® Plus users can easily connect with clients and colleagues online to review contracts or documents. 

Share Your Screen – Walk through real estate transactions and related documents online while transaction participants view from the comfort of their PC.
Convenient Connections – Screen sharing allows zipForm® Plus users to connect with clients at any time. 

A zipForm® Plus or zipLogix™ Community account is required to start a screen sharing session.
